headline: Central bank signals potential change in interest-rate path
summary: Officials indicated incoming data will guide future decisions. Markets are repricing expectations across rate-sensitive areas.
body: Officials indicated incoming data will guide future decisions. Markets are repricing expectations across rate-sensitive areas. Some sectors may benefit while others face higher costs, depending on exposure and pricing power.
